name: recommendation-engine-ui
description: Management dashboard for the Recommendation Engine

scripts.start: bash -c '${VROOLI_ROOT:-$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)}/scripts/lib/ui-guard.sh python3 -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 3000 2>/dev/null || echo 'Python not found, serving at file://$(pwd)/index.html''
scripts.build: echo 'Build complete - static files ready for deployment'

author: Vrooli Recommendation Engine
